product_page_short_description: Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Quality Tracker
full_description:
SoundPEATS Watch 1 Fitness Tracker Smart Watch

The SOUNDPEATS Watch 1 Fitness Tracker Smart Watch comes with a 1.4" touch screen display. It is equipped with a heart rate monitor and sleep quality tracker, ensuring you stay attuned to your body's rhythms. The smart watch can seamlessly receive call and message reminders. The IP68 waterproof rating grants you the freedom to engage in water activities worry-free. This watch is your earth-proof companion, capable of enduring diverse environments. It can deliver up to 10 days of battery life, keeping you connected and informed. The wrist-based heart rate measurement provides real-time training insights while adapting to your intensity levels, even during aquatic workouts. Sleep Score and Advanced Sleep Monitoring provide valuable data to optimize your sleep patterns via the SOUNDPEATS App.

Wrist-Based Heart Rate Measure

The SoundPEATS Watch 1 features a continuous 24/7 heart rate monitor, utilizing a PPG sensor with three green LEDs. It provides real-time heart rate readings, enabling you to align your workout pace for optimal efficiency and health. You can review your heart rate graph as well as data on resting, average, maximum, and minimum heart rates through the SOUNDPEATS SPORTS app.

Sleep Score and Advanced Sleep Monitoring

The SoundPEATS Watch 1 Smart Watch monitors your sleep patterns, capturing data on deep sleep, light sleep, and awake duration. It gently rouses you with silent vibrating alarms. The SOUNDPEATS SPORTS app offers an in-depth sleep quality analysis, aiding you in making adjustments for a healthier lifestyle.

Call & Message Reminder

The SoundPEATS Watch 1 Smart Watch features call and message reminders, enabling you to read notifications for calls, SMS, and various social media platforms such as Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat, Facebook, Twitter, and WhatsApp directly on your wrist, ensuring you stay connected with the world.

IP68 Waterproof

The SoundPEATS Watch 1 Fitness Tracker Smart Watch has an IP68 waterproof rating, allowing you to confidently wear it in rain, during showers, or while swimming in a pool. Please note that it doesn't support swimming mode.

full_description:
SoundPEATS Watch 4 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The SoundPEATS Watch 4 is a versatile Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch designed to enhance your active lifestyle and keep you connected on the go. Featuring a large 1.38" touch screen, navigating through its features and apps is intuitive and effortless. With an impressive 109+ sports modes, this smartwatch is a perfect companion for tracking various activities and workouts, helping you stay motivated and achieve your fitness goals. Enjoy up to 7 hours of battery backup, ensuring that your watch keeps up with your day without frequent recharging. Plus, with its IP68 waterproof rating, the SoundPEATS Watch 4 is resilient against water and dust, making it suitable for swimming and outdoor activities without worry. Stay connected, track your fitness, and enjoy convenience and durability with the SoundPEATS Watch 4 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch.

Make/Answer Calls & Message Reminder

SoundPEATS Watch 4 smart watches include an integrated microphone and HD speaker. After pairing with your phone over Bluetooth, you may use the wristwatch to make or answer calls, receive messages, manage contacts, and monitor call history. It will also vibrate to alert you to incoming calls, SMS, or messages from applications such as WhatsApp, Facebook, and Twitter (customize the vibration level to high, medium, or low), ensuring that you never miss an important call or message. It's also voice assistant compatible, making operation much easier.

Health Monitor

This Watch 4 smart watch uses a high-precision sensor to monitor your health indicators 24 hours a day, seven days a week, including heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep (awake, light sleep, deep sleep), and women's menstrual cycle reminders. It will also alert you if your heart rate is abnormally high or low. All recorded data may be linked to the SoundPEATS Sports APP for analysis, offering vital insights into your health and enabling lifestyle changes.

109+ Sports Modes

You may instantly enter sports mode by tapping the dedicated sports button on the side. This Watch 4 sports watch has over 109 sports modes and can monitor vital statistics like exercise heart rate, distance traveled, movement speed, and calories burnt in real time for most sports modes, allowing you to track and enhance your athletic performance.

1.38" Touch Screen & DIY Watch Faces

The Watch 4 Smartwatch with 1.38" HD full touch color screen provides a sharper visual and smoother operation experience. Six brightness settings make it easy to see information in the light or in the dark. The watch's central frame is made of high-strength aluminum alloy, which provides strong protection. The fitness smartwatch offers over 222 free watch faces that can be downloaded and utilized in the app. You may also set your favorite photo as a watch face.

Long Battery Life & More Functions

This Watch 4 Smart watch has large-capacity batteries that can be completely charged in 2 hours, utilized for up to 7 days, and have a standby period of around 30 days. The fitness watch is compatible with both iOS and Android devices (iOS 9.0 or above, Android 5.0 or higher). The wristwatch will also have calculator, sedentary reminders, Do Not Disturb, weather, alarms, and find phone capabilities.

IP68 Waterproof

The SoundPEATS Watch 4 Smart Watch holds an IP68 rating, rendering it capable of enduring dust, dirt, and sand exposure, and offering resistance against submersion up to a depth of 1.5 meters underwater for a duration of thirty minutes.
